com.montefiore.gaulthiergain.adhoclibrary.network.aodv

Class RREP

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.montefiore.gaulthiergain.adhoclibrary.network.aodv.AodvMessage
      • com.montefiore.gaulthiergain.adhoclibrary.network.aodv.RREP
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable

    public class RREP
extends AodvMessage

    This class represents a RREP message and all theses fields for the AODV protocol.

    See Also:

    • Constructor Detail

      • RREP

        public RREP()
        Default constructor

      • RREP

        public RREP(int type,
            int hopCount,
            java.lang.String destIpAddress,
            long sequenceNum,
            java.lang.String originIpAddress,
            long lifetime)
        Constructor
        Parameters:
        type - an integer value which represents the type of the RREP message.
        hopCount - an integer value which represents the hops number of the RREP message.
        destIpAddress - a String value which represents the destination IP address of the RREP message.
        sequenceNum - a long value which represents the sequence number of the RREP message
        originIpAddress - a String value which represents the source IP address of the RREP message.
        lifetime - a long value which represents the lifetime of the RREP message.
